attributes.action: All MPs to link a source of data/information when tweeting claims and statistics
attributes.background: Mandate all MPs to add a source link for any claims they are making online

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how to use social media are a matter for individual MPs, not the UK Government or Parliament. Similarly, decisions about the terms and conditions for particular social media platforms are a matter for individual social media platforms, not the Government or Parliament.
